## PrefixedKey type

Construct a string type by adding the specified `TPrefix` (string literal) to the given `TKey` (string literal)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PrefixedKey<TKey extends Key, TPrefix> = TKey extends string ? TPrefix extends Prefix ? `${TPrefix}-${TKey}` : TKey : TKey;
```
**References:** [Prefix](./use-prefixed-props.prefix.md)

## Example


```ts
 type BarKey = PrefixedKey<"foo", "bar">
 // "bar-foo"
```
